tool.name: Collect_Summary_Products_tool

param.name: in_network
param.dialogReference: The project folder for the entire BRAT run.

param.name: clipping_network
param.dialogReference: The network to summarize. Use the most recently generated network. If multiple networks are passed in, it will create the summary table as if they were merged into one.

param.name: watershed_name
param.dialogReference: The name of the watershed or area being summarized. This will only be used to title sheets in the excel document.

param.name: excel_file_name
param.dialogReference: The name of the output excel file.

param.name: dams_shapefile
param.dialogReference: A shapefile containing dams data for the input networks. These behave in the same way, where multiple inputs are treated as if they were merged. Necessary if you want summary statistics pertaining to dams.

param.name: output_folder
param.dialogReference: The folder where everything will be saved and proper Summary Folder structure will be created.

tool.summary: Generates a table with summary statistics for any number of networks. Also creates a new folder structure for summary products.

dataIdInfo.idAbs: Generates a table with summary statistics for any number of networks. Also creates a new folder structure for summary products.
